Topic.Name: Local
Topic.Description:
The goings-on at our beautiful hometown of Rockettopia, where the football team usually wins, the Wicca Club definately doesn't summon demons, the Community Farm is - and this is true - built on an old nuclear missile site, and all the children are above average.

Our thanks to Garrison Keillor for providing us with plenty of material to plagiarize.

Topic.Name: High School
Topic.Description: The best years of your life! until the years that immediately follow.

Topic.Name: College
Topic.Description: This topic is about to get a lot more prominent.
This is going to be so much fun!

Topic.Name: Donald Trump
Topic.Description: It's like watching a slow-motion train wreck in soundbite form.

Topic.Description: You should probably skip this topic; it will just make you angry.
